body.name: PEDOOLO Label Printer, Bluetooth Shipping Label Printer, 4x6 Thermal Printer for Shipping Packages, Compatible with Android.iOS.Windows, Mac, Chromebook, Amazon, Ebay, UPS.USPS, FedEx, Shopify
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 52 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 52 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: 【Wireless & Support for Multi-Systems】PEDOOLO thermal printer prints wirelessly. For iOS, Android, and iPad, download the App “Label Expert” and connect via Bluetooth. For Windows, you can also print via Bluetooth. Windows, Mac, and Chromebook support USB connection. Chromebook users can directly print by adding the extension "Shipping Printer". (Note: Mac and Chromebook do not support Bluetooth printing.)

【Versatile Compatibility for Platforms & Labels】The shipping label printer, a great assistant for online small business, is compatible with almost all shipping and e-commerce platforms, including Amazon, eBay, UPS, FedEx, Shopify, etc. (Note: Save as PDF from platforms) Besides, the label printer supports any brand thermal labels with 1.57" to 4.1" width, allowing you to customize and print product labels, barcode labels, thanks stickers, etc. (Note: Customize labels via smartphone APP)

【High-res, High-speed and Massive-Volume】With a Japanese upgraded thermal print head, the label printer for shipping packages prints up to 150mm/s (72 sheets 4x6 labels/min) and can effortlessly print over 50 kilometers (over 500,000 shipping labels). 203 DPI makes labels come out clearly for easy reading and scanning. The shipping label printer for small business does achieve ink-free, mess-free, cost-effective, and time-saving.

【Small & Smart & Efficient】The thermal label printer features automatic calibration & positioning, intelligent paper return, and intelligent self-test, avoiding paper waste or jams. It achieves efficiency with just one click. With compact size, the bluetooth thermal label printer can be easily used at home, office, and warehouse.

【Reliable Technical Support】PEDOOLO customer service team is available to assist you via phone, online chat, email, remote-desktop, ensuring one-minute setup and hassle-free operation. Rest assured with our lifetime technical support and 10-year warranty. (Note: 100 sheets labels and a U-disk containing guided videos are provided in the package.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Two Connection Methods for PEDOOLO Thermal Printer Note: Mac, Chromebook, and Linux do not support Bluetooth printing.

Easy to Setup and Print in Minutes One-Second APP Connection 1. Download “Label Expert” APP 2. Connect Bluetooth 3. Import the file and print One-Minute Driver Installation 1. Install printer driver 2. Set printer preferences 3. Open the file and print One-Minute Extension Adding 1. Add “Shipping Printer” extension 2. Set printer preferences 3. Open the file and print

Automated & Intelligent Auto Label Calibration & Positioning Press and hold on the feed button until you hear one beep, the shipping label maker calibrates label size automatically to prevent paper jams. Intelligent Paper Return After loading paper from the back, the wireless label printer draws it, positions it, and returns it to the starting point, minimizing paper waste. Intelligent Self-Test Press and hold on the feed button until you hear 3 beeps, the thermal printer will print self-test page to check the printer settings and operational status.
Note: Please customize labels via smartphone on the Label Expert APP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The PEDOOLO Label Printer has completely simplified my shipping workflow. It's a Bluetooth-enabled device that enables direct label printing from my smartphone, making the process of creating 4x6 thermal labels straightforward and efficient. Thanks to its thermal printing capabilities, it forgoes the need for ink cartridges, ensuring the labels are both clear and long-lasting. The ability to print labels directly from a mobile device is incredibly convenient, drastically reducing the time and hassle typically associated with shipping preparation.The initial setup of the printer was hassle-free, and its compact, sleek design ensures it doesn't clutter up the workspace. For anyone involved in shipping, the PEDOOLO Label Printer is a must-have, offering a smart and streamlined approach to label printing that does away with the old methods of manual taping and typing, facilitating a much smoother shipping experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast wireless labels
reviews.reviewText: The PEDOOLO Label Printer has revolutionized my shipping experience, making the cumbersome task of labeling packages a breeze. As a Bluetooth-enabled thermal printer, it has significantly streamlined the shipping process, eliminating the need for taping, cutting, and typing labels manually. This printer's standout feature is its ability to connect seamlessly to my phone via Bluetooth, allowing me to print labels directly from my mobile device.Gone are the days of fumbling with tapes and scissors,the Label Printer effortlessly prints clear and professional 4x6 thermal labels. The thermal printing technology ensures sharp and durable labels without the mess of ink cartridges. The convenience of printing directly from my phone is a game-changer, saving me time and effort. Whether I'm at home, in the office, or on the go, I can quickly generate shipping labels with just a few taps on my phone.Setting up the printer was a breeze, thanks to its user-friendly design and compatibility with various devices. The compact and sleek design of the Label Printer also makes it easy to integrate into any workspace without taking up much room.In conclusion, the Label Printer is a reliable and efficient tool for anyone involved in shipping packages. Its Bluetooth connectivity, thermal printing technology, and user-friendly design make it a valuable asset, simplifying the labeling process and enhancing overall productivity. Say goodbye to tape, cuts, and manual label typing – the Label Printer is the modern solution for hassle-free shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for quick, simple printing of shipping labels
reviews.reviewText: I had been printing a lot of 4x6 inch shipping labels recently and it’s a hassle to load special paper into my printer every time, so I thought it was time to get a dedicated label printer. I wanted something simple to use, reliable, and that didn’t cost a small fortune. I am happy to report that this printer has turned out to be everything I had hoped for.Set up was a breeze. One plug goes into the wall. A USB plug connects to my computer, and then I was ready to go. Well... not exactly. I had to load the software driver for my Mac, but that was simple. There is a bluetooth connectivity feature, but as of now it doesn’t work with the Mac. But I’m using this printer with a desktop iMac, so I don’t mind using a USB connection.The printer comes with two small packs of 4x6 inch labels in folded stacks, and all you have to do is insert the edge of a label in the back, press a button, and the printer will automatically calibrate where to position the label so everything is aligned right.My first label didn’t come out right. But fortunately, the support for this printer is good. There is a printed user manual, an online version, and a website with videos that give clear instructions. And if all that doesn’t help, there is an even a phone number to call for help. It took me one 3 minute video to figure out that I hadn’t changed the settings in the printer software from letter-sized page to 4x6 inches. There are even helpful videos for printing from common sources, like eBay, Shopify, PayPal and a bunch of others.The printer will print different sizes and shapes of labels, and you can set custom sizes with the software. But honestly all I need it for is an occasional shipping label. My monthly duty cycle will probably be less than 50 labels. If I were printing a lot more, I might have gone for something more heavy duty. But so far, this printer seems ideal for my needs. And with the savings in ink costs (because this is a thermal printer that does not use ink), I expect it will pay for itself within a few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Versatile Label Printer
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PEDOOLO Label Printer, and it has significantly streamlined my shipping process. The printer's compatibility with Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, and Chromebook makes it incredibly versatile and user-friendly.Setting up the Bluetooth connection was a breeze, and I was able to start printing 4x6 thermal labels in no time. The print quality is sharp and clear, ensuring that all the shipping information is easily readable. This has been particularly helpful for my shipments on various platforms like Amazon, Ebay, UPS, USPS, FedEx, and Shopify.One of the standout features is its fast printing speed, saving me valuable time, especially during peak shipping periods. The compact design doesn't take up much space, and the build quality feels durable.I appreciate the convenience of being able to print labels from multiple devices, making it a versatile solution for my business needs. The compatibility with major shipping carriers is a big plus, and it has seamlessly integrated into my workflow.In summary, the PEDOOLO Label Printer is a reliable and efficient choice for anyone in need of a quality label printer for shipping packages. I highly recommend it for its ease of use, compatibility, and overall performance.
